title: Enchanting Navaratan Champaswaralu Necklace
materials: Natural Pearls. Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: Intricately crafted with floral motifs, this Champaswaralu necklace showcases a central pendant adorned with navratan gemstones. The design evokes traditional South Indian craftsmanship with a modern minimalist approach. Delicate pearl drops enhance the feminine appeal. The diamonds are pave set to maximize sparkle.
occasions: and special occasions. Also a timeless piece for modern festive wear.
description: A stunning fusion of traditional South Indian design and modern aesthetics. This Champaswaralu features genuine gemstones and pearls, meticulously set in high-quality gold. The Hyderabadi polish guarantees longevity and a brilliant shine. A heirloom-worthy piece that can be passed down through generations.
